arts.ttl: "It's just a matter of time" – Xabi Alonso backs Wirtz to succeed at Liverpool
arts.sum: Xabi Alonso is confident that Florian Wirtz will silence his doubters at Liverpool.

arts.ttl: Trent Alexander-Arnold sums up Liverpool feelings in one word before Real Madrid clash
arts.sum: Trent Alexander-Arnold could face Liverpool for the first time since his summer move to Real Madrid and the full-back has sent a message ahead of his Anfield return.

arts.ttl: “Always nice” – Liverpool midfielder’s father asked about Real Madrid links
arts.sum: Liverpool host Real Madrid in the Champions League at Anfield later today. Ahead of this clash, Tuesday’s edition of AS has published an interview with Liverpool star Alexis Mac Allister’s father, Carlos. Over the years, the Liverpool player has been linked to Real Madrid but there weren’t any concrete developments. arts.ttl: Emotional Trent Alexander-Arnold returns to Anfield with Real Madrid to pay tribute to Diogo Jota
arts.sum: A heartfelt moment unfolded in Liverpool as a delegation from Real Madrid, comprising Trent Alexander-Arnold, Xabi Alonso, Dean Huijsen, and Emilio Butragueno, visited a mural near Anfield to pay tribute to Diogo Jota, the late Liverpool forward who tragically passed away this past summer. The Real Madrid representatives laid a bouquet at the memorial, a […] The post Emotional Trent Alexander-Arnold returns to Anfield with Real Madrid to pay tribute to Diogo Jota appeared first on Madrid Universal.

arts.ttl: Liverpool vs Real Madrid – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: Liverpool host Real Madrid on Tuesday for a crucial Champions League showdown, desperately needing to build on their weekend victory. A 2-0 win over Aston Villa finally ended a dreadful four-game losing streak in the Premier League. Now, the Reds must carry that momentum onto the European stage. arts.sum: Two of European football’s most decorated clubs clash at Anfield on Tuesday as Liverpool host Real Madrid in a blockbuster Champions League tie. The Reds ended a shocking four-game losing streak at the weekend. arts.ttl: Liverpool get clear verdict in worrying Real Madrid prediction for Trent Alexander-Arnold return
arts.sum: Arne Slot's side face an uphill battle against in-form Real Madrid in their blockbuster Champions League tie at Anfield on Tuesday night, despite victory over Aston Villa

arts.ttl: Trent Alexander-Arnold's new life at Real Madrid as he makes Anfield return: His inner circle in Spain, the Liverpool team-mates who haven't stayed in touch and how he keeps himself busy off the pitch
arts.sum: On Tuesday night, Anfield will host 22 of the greatest footballers from all corners of God's green earth. But before this showpiece, the attention is on a lad from just round the corner.
